    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(int rows,
            int columns,
            int snakesNumber,
            int laddersNumber,
            java.lang.String parts)
        Name: Game
        This method is the constructor #1 of the class. It is use when the user write the symbols of the players.
        Pos: The game was created successfully.
        Parameters:
        rows - int. Amount of rows. rows!=0.
        columns - int. Amount of columns. columns!=0.
        snakesNumber - int. Amount of snakes. snakesNumber!=0.
        laddersNumber - int. Amount of ladder. laddersNumber!=0.
        parts - String. Symbols string. parts!="" Y parts!=null.

      • Game

        public Game(int rows,
            int columns,
            int snakesNumber,
            int laddersNumber,
            int numberOfPlayers)
        Name: Game
        This method is the constructor #2 of the class. It is use when the user write the amount of players.
        Pos: The game was created successfully.
        Parameters:
        rows - int. Amount of rows. rows!=0.
        columns - int. Amount of columns. columns!=0.
        snakesNumber - int. Amount of snakes. snakesNumber!=0.
        laddersNumber - int. Amount of ladder. laddersNumber!=0.
        numberOfPlayers - int. Amount of players. numberOfPlayers higher or equal to 1 and numberOfPlayers lower or equal to 8.

      • createPlayers

        public void createPlayers(Player pPlayer,
                          java.lang.String parts,
                          int i,
                          int p)
        Name: createPlayers.
        This method create the amount of players according to the amount of symbols written by the user, and each player has one of the symbols written by the user.
        Pre: The grid must already be created and must have the numbers.
        Pre: The user wrote a symbols string to create the players. Pos: The players were created successfully.
        Parameters:
        pPlayer - Player. Previous player.
        parts - String. Word with the symbols.
        i - int. Index of each symbol. Every time that a player is created, its value increases but it has to be less than the amount of symbols.
        p - int. Amount of players. Every time that a player is created, its value decreases.

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Name: startGame.
        This method start the game because delete the numbers of the grid and show the new grid.

      • movePlayer

        public boolean movePlayer(Player player,
                          boolean end)
        Name: movePlayer.
        This method move player by player according to the value of the dice. To move the next player, is necessary a line break
        Pre: The players must already be created.
        Pos: The player was moved successfully.
        Parameters:
        player - Player. Next Player.
        end - boolean. Indicate if there is a player in the last box.
        Returns:
        stop boolean. It will be true when a player gets to the last box and the game will end.

      • simul

        public void simul(Player player,
                  boolean end)
        Name: simul.
        This method is the simulation mode where the game play by itself. This method doesn't need a line break to continue
        The simulation model will end when a player gets to the last box.
        Pre: The players must already be created.
        Pos: The players played successfully.
        Parameters:
        player - Player. Next Player.
        end - boolean. Indicate if there is a player in the last box.
